name: The Tempering of Lockbright
description:
Requires 1-4 XBOX Controllers to Play

The Tempering of Lockbright: An Escape "House". 

Just like an escape room, this house will lock you in when you enter! Our story surrounds four expert “house-flippers” who are tasked with tempering the Lockbright Manor. Unfortunately, after it had been abandoned by a cultist, monsters have made this home their own. If not completed in 10 minutes, the house will self destruct and players will fail their mission!

The game may be completed by 1-4 players, each given a unique ability to aid in solving the puzzles. The scholar can translate hints to help solve puzzles, the acrobat can reach high places and run at a faster pace, the arsonist provides more light and heat critical to solving some puzzles, and restorer can heal players and withered ingredients.

Game made as students at the University of Utah. 

Producer, Designer, Miscellaneous: Penny Kite

Lead Engineer and Programmer: Oscar Johnston

Programmer and Puzzle Engineer: Kyle Georgi

Character Artist and Animator: Milu Gan

Room and Environment Artist: Bella D’Angelo
